content.rendered:
Neville’s Haze Female Cannabis Seeds

Neville’s Haze is an old school, multiple time cup winning hybrid that set the standard for Hazes! A long flowering time. This pure sativa will is tall and require lots of maintenance. Well recommended for sativa lovers who miss the powerful effects of the original Haze.

We wanted to make a feminized version to honour the Dutch legend Neville Schoenmakers, and are extremely proud of the results. Neville’s Haze will grow at a fast pace, with long, thin fan leaves and a wide internodal spacing. Plant training may be beneficial, such as tying down or topping to help control the final height.

Flowering time will be long depending on the phenotype. The buds will have an elongated structure that grows all the way up the branches. Neville’s Haze cannabis seeds will have an aggressively fast growth and lanky sativa structure.

Thanks to high levels of Limonene, Myrcene and Pinene, expect a mixture of floral, citrus, lime, earthy and herbal aromas and flavours. The effect can be described as a soaring cerebral high, causing high energy, clarity, and a feel good factor that is perfect for morning and daytimes, but may keep you awake late at night.

meta._et_pb_old_content:
White Widow Female Cannabis Seeds

Hybrid. (Brazilian Sativa x South Indian Indica) x Northern Lights Special. Very stable, very homogenous and covered in trichomes. Sour, earthy aroma. White Widow is a classic in Amsterdam’s many coffeeshops and has always been very popular among growers and consumers alike, this strain is our take on this famous variety. Our feminized White Widow was created by crossing our regular White Widow with one of our all time favorites: Northern Lights Special. The result is a very stable and homogenous strain that is even more compact and potent than our regular White Widow. This hybrid strain shows sativa characteristics when it comes to bud shape and resin production, but the compact structure, short flowering period and leaf shape are more like an indica variety. White Widow will show the first signs of flowering after around three or four weeks and has a mid to dark green colour. She does extremely well in hydroponic setups and has an excellent flower to leaf ratio. White Widow has a floral, earthy aroma with hints of fruit. The high sets on quickly and is an active, mind stimulating high with a nice mild relaxing body stone. Its medicinal uses include alleviating neuropathic pains, muscle spasms and muscular cramps.

title.rendered: Neville’s Haze Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

content.rendered:
Neville’s Haze Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

Neville’s Haze Auto is an old school, created from a multiple time cup winning hybrid that set the standard for Hazes! With a very long flowering time, this pure sativa auto will grow tall and require lots of maintenance. Well recommended for sativa lovers who miss the powerful effects of the original Haze.

We wanted to make an automatic feminized version to honour the Dutch legend Neville Schoenmakers, and are extremely proud of the results. Neville’s Haze Auto will grow at a fast pace, with long, thin fan leaves and a wide internodal spacing. Plant training is advised, such as tying down or topping to help control the final height. The buds will have an elongated structure that grows all the way up the branches. Neville’s Haze Auto cannabis seeds are best suited for experienced growers due to her aggressively fast growth and lanky sativa structure.

Thanks to high levels of Limonene, Myrcene and Pinene, expect a mixture of floral, citrus, lime, earthy and herbal aromas and flavours. The effect can be described as a soaring cerebral high, causing high energy, clarity, and a feel good factor that is perfect for morning and daytimes, but may keep you awake late at night. We recommend planting Neville’s Haze Auto outside during May until September and indoors to use a 20/4 light regime for best results.

title.rendered: Mint Runtz Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

content.rendered:
Mint Runtz Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

A three-way hybrid made from Gelato, Zkittles and Thin Mints. Mouth watering tropical, fruity and candy shop flavours and aroma, with an uplifting euphoric effect. Short to medium flowering time.

Easily one of our favourite crosses to make, we took the Thin Mints and reversed her to the Runtz. The outcome is an exotic, low maintenance hybrid which grows medium tall with compact buds with hints of purples, pink and red hues. Runtz Mints cannabis seeds stay low, making them low maintenance.

Once flowering, plants will double in size and produce one main cola with short side branches. An excellent choice for small grow spaces or Sea of Green setups. Fan leaves will become frosted and begin to curl inwards with trichomes, with glistening frosted buds stacking up.

One of the most terpene rich strains we have to offer, Runtz Mints will be composed of fruity, tropical, exotic, berry and mint terpenes thanks to the high levels of Limonene, Myrcene and Caryophyllene. The effects are a balance of euphoric, upbeat and very relaxed, making this strain ideal for social scenarios and creative people.

content.rendered:
Mint Runtz Female Cannabis Seeds

A three-way hybrid made from Gelato, Zkittles and Thin Mints. Mouth watering tropical, fruity and candy shop flavours and aroma, with an uplifting euphoric effect. 8–9 weeks flowering time, very good yields that will produce the best hash and extracts around.

Easily one of our favourite crosses to make, we took the Thin Mints and reversed her to the Runtz. The outcome is an exotic, easy to grow hybrid which grows medium tall with compact buds with hints of purples, pink and red hues. Runtz Mints cannabis seeds do not grow too tall, making them easy to maintain. Once flowering, plants will double in size and produce one main cola with short side branches. An excellent choice for small grow spaces or Sea of Green setups. Fan leaves will become frosted and begin to curl inwards with trichomes, with glistening frosted buds stacking up.

One of the most terpene rich strains we have to offer, Runtz Mints will be composed of fruity, tropical, exotic, berry and mint terpenes thanks to the high levels of Limonene, Myrcene and Caryophyllene. The effects are a balance of euphoric, upbeat and very relaxed, making this strain ideal for social scenarios and creative people.

content.rendered:
Gorilla Female Cannabis Seeds

Spliff Gorilla is our own version of Gorilla Glue. A large yielding hybrid created from Sour Dubb and Chocolate Diesel genetics. Incredibly resinous and epic producer. Short to medium flowering time with massive buds, earthy, chemical and diesel aroma and taste.

We were able to reverse the original Gorilla Glue clones from the USA, to produce our own version of cup winning Gorilla Glue, which we call Spliff Gorilla.. Be ready for an extra sticky plant, with exceptional amounts of trichomes that will grow into a large sized plant with heavy yielding side branches, and a high calyx to leaf ratio.

It is a good idea to add support whilst flowering Spliff Gorilla plants are in bloom due to the side branches becoming heavy. Spliff Gorilla can take a high EC, making her perfect for soil growers and hydroponics. Solid yields of fat buds that can stick to your wall!

The aroma can be described as pungent, loud and a mixture of glue, chemical, earthy, with diesel and fuel overtones, due to high amounts of Pinene and Caryophyllene. Be warned when smoking Spliff Gorilla as she has the power to wipe you out leaving you in a chilled out and lazy slumber.

content.rendered:
Gorilla Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

Gorilla Auto is our own version of Gorilla Glue. A large yielding hybrid created from Sour Dubb and Chocolate Diesel genetics and autoflowering genetics. Incredibly resinous and epic producer. Long flowering time with massive buds, earthy, chemical and diesel aroma and taste.

We were able to reverse the original Gorilla Glue clones from the USA, to produce our own version of cup winning Gorilla Glue, which we call Gorilla. Then we made an auto flowering feminized version! Be ready for an extra sticky plant, with exceptional amounts of trichomes that will grow into a large sized plant with heavy yielding side branches, and a high calyx to leaf ratio with a long flowering time.

Adding support can help Spliff Gorilla Auto plants due to the side branches becoming heavy. Spliff Gorilla Auto can take a high EC, making her perfect for soil growers and hydroponic systems If you want solid yields of fat buds that can stick to your wall, then look no further than this strain!

The aroma can be described as pungent, loud and a mixture of glue, chemical, earthy, with diesel and fuel overtones, due to high amounts of Pinene and Caryophyllene. Be warned when smoking Spliff Gorilla Auto as she has the power to wipe you out leaving you in a chilled out and lazy slumber. We recommend planting Gorilla Auto outside during May until September and indoors to use a 20/4 light regime for best results.

content.rendered:
Gelato Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

Gelato Auto is a world-class hybrid created from crossing Sunset Sherbert, Thin Mint Cookies and autoflowering genetics. Gelato Auto cannabis seeds will be a long flowering plant with a potent effect high in THC, with creamy, fruity and gassy flavours.

We created Gelato Auto cannabis seeds by crossing the clones we were sent from the USA, and produced our own feminized auto version. Gelato Auto plants are low maintenance and will stay low during the growth period, and double in size later on. She is an extremely resinous plant that covers all the leaves and buds totally white, making her great for hash and extracts. The buds are compact, dense and super sticky to touch with great yielding potential. An easy to trim plant, that can take high amounts of nutrients and does not require much maintenance once flowering.

What makes Gelato Auto cannabis seeds so special is her amazing lip licking taste, thanks to the high amounts of Limonene, Humulene and Caryophyllene terpenes. Expect sweet, vanilla, mint flavours with hints of fruit. The effects of Gelato Auto are very potent and a heavy hitting strain with a euphoric high combined with a strong couch lock effect. We recommend planting Gelato Auto outside during May until September and indoors to use a 20/4 light regime for best results.

title.rendered: Blue Dream Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

content.rendered:
Blue Dream Automatic Female Cannabis Seeds

Blue Dream Auto is a low maintenance , tropical tasting and an excellent yielding hybrid. A cross of Blueberry, Haze and autoflowering parents. Long flowering time.

Our version of Blue Dream Auto was created by reversing the Blue Dream clone to autoflowering genetics to make an S1 that is exceptionally easy to grow, and expressed hybrid vigour. We found all the Blue Dream Auto plants have long flowering times depending on the phenotype.

Blue Dream Auto cannabis seeds can become very large and bushy, so we advise them to train them , for the ultimate yields. There will be one massive main cola surrounded by medium-sized branches, similar to a Christmas tree.

You will feel like you are on a tropical island when you have Blue Dream Auto close by, with floral, sweet, candy like aromas with ripe blueberry and fresh berry notes. When tested, Myrcene and Caryophyllene were the most abundant terpenes. Blue Dream Auto is high in THC so has a long-lasting effect that makes you feel happy, energized, creative, well motivated and clear.

Blue Dream Auto performs best outside during May until September and indoors to use a 20/4 light regime for best results.
